translation.pdp.technicalError: We're having a technical problem on this page. Refresh the page and try your selection again or find another product.
translation.pdp.quantitySelector.title: Quantity
translation.pdp.addToBag.errorMessage: We're experiencing a technical problem and this item cannot be added to bag. Please refresh the page or try again later. If the problem persists, Customer Service can help you at 1-800-427-7895.
translation.pdp.addToBag.ariaLabel: Add to bag. This button will add the item to your bag and open a dialog window. After opening press tab to move context to dialog.
translation.pdp.buyBox.errorMessage.generalError: We're having a technical problem on this page. Refresh the page and try your selection again or find another product.

translation.pdp.emailSignUpCheckbox: Sign up for our emails to get first dibs on new arrivals, can't miss deals and more.
translation.pdp.findItNow.storeList.errorMessage: We couldn't find a store that matched your criteria. Please try again.
translation.pdp.findItNow.storeSelectButton.ariaLabe: Reserve this item at the {{storeName}} store
translation.pdp.findItNow.findItNowAriaLabel: Find it now. This button will open a dialog window. After opening press tab to move context to dialog.

translation.pdp.findItNow.selection.error.needsZipCo: Please enter a zip code to see store availability.
translation.pdp.findItNow.selection.error.noStoresFo: We couldn't find a store that matched your criteria. Please try again.
translation.pdp.findItNow.selection.error.invalidZip: Your current zip code is {{zipCode}}. {{storesLength}} stores have been listed below based on this zip code. If you‚Äôd like to change the zip code, please enter a valid 5-digit zip code.
translation.pdp.findItNow.selection.error.unknown: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.
Search Zip code to find store availability. Stores will populate after a valid 5 digit code is entered
translation.pdp.findInStore.launchModal.ariaLabel: Find it now will launch a window dialog to help you find out if this item is available to reserve at a store near you for pickup.

translation.pdp.reservationView.errorMessage: We are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again later or call us for assistance.

translation.pdp.storeLocator.confirmationEmailText: Review the email we sent you to see where to go in the store to pick up your items.
translation.pdp.storeLocator.confirmationBagText: We'll hold your item until closing time.

translation.pdp.storeLocator.reservationPleaseNote: Please Note: You can reserve five items daily.
translation.pdp.storeLocator.reservationCopyText: After we confirm an item is available, we hold it until the store closes the following day. Prices in store may differ from prices online.
